#!/static/bin/ash
PATH=/bin:/sbin:/usr/bin:/usr/sbin:/static/bin:/static/sbin
. /etc/rc.defaults . /etc/rc.subr/extractbootparams . /etc/rc.subr/colors
for i in /etc/xinitrc.d/[0-9][0-9][0-9][0-9]-*.?? ; do provides="` cat $i | grep '#lesslinux provides' | awk '{print $3}' `" if echo "$skipservices" | grep -q '|'$provides'|' ; then echo "Skipping $provides" else $i start fi done
if [ "$lang" = "es" ] ; then ln -sf /usr/share/themes/Xfce-dawn/gtk-2.0/gtkrc /home/surfer/.gtkrc ln -sf /usr/share/themes/Xfce-dawn/gtk-2.0/gtkrc /home/surfer/.gtkrc-2.0 sed -i 's/Xfce-saltlake/Xfce-dawn/g' /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/xfconf/xfce-perchannel-xml/xsettings.xml echo -n > /home/surfer/Desktop/rescuecd2011_www.desktop cat >> /home/surfer/Desktop/rescuecd2011_www.desktop << LLWWW [Desktop Entry] Version=1.0 Encoding=UTF-8 Type=Application Name=Rescue CD 2011 Comment= Categories=Application; Exec=exo-open http://www.computerhoy.es/rescuecd2011 Icon=www Terminal=false StartupNotify=true
LLWWW
fi
# /usr/bin/xterm & # setxkbmap -rules xorg -model pc105 -layout "$xkbmap"
# Change some firefox settings according to language if [ "$lang" = "pl" ] ; then if [ -f /home/surfer/.mozilla/firefox/kqe39h9l.default/polish_mod ]; then echo "Polish files already copied" else mv /home/surfer/.mozilla/firefox/kqe39h9l.default /home/surfer/.mozilla/firefox/kqe39h9l.default.de mv /home/surfer/.mozilla/firefox/kqe39h9l.default.pl /home/surfer/.mozilla/firefox/kqe39h9l.default touch /home/surfer/.mozilla/firefox/kqe39h9l.default/polish_mod fi else rm -rf /home/surfer/.mozilla/firefox/kqe39h9l.default.pl fi
# replace old path for background file on COMPUTERBILD edition sed -i 's/\/etc\/lesslinux\/branding\/computerbild\/desktop-cb-20090707\.jpg/\/etc\/lesslinux\/branding\/desktop.jpg/' /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/xfconf/xfce-perchannel-xml/xfce4-desktop.xml # Replace old version path in Thunderbirds desktop icon sed -i 's/-2\.0\.0\.22//g' /home/surfer/Desktop/020_thunderbird.desktop sed -i 's/-2\.0\.0\.22//g' /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/launcher-12473156652.rc sed -i 's/\/opt\/firefox\/lib/\/opt\/firefox35\/lib/g' /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/launcher-10.rc sed -i 's/\/opt\/firefox\/lib/\/opt\/firefox35\/lib/g' /home/surfer/Desktop/010_firefox.desktop
if mount | grep '/home' | grep '/dev/mapper' ; then echo '/home seems to be on container, no need to delete Thunderbird' else echo '/home does not seem to be on container, deleting Thunderbird' rm /home/surfer/Desktop/020_thunderbird.desktop rm /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/launcher-12473156652.rc sed -i 's/<item name="launcher" id="12473156652"\/>/<!-- weg damit -->/g' /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/panels.xml if [ -f /etc/lesslinux/surfer.hash ] ; then echo 'Hash for surfer exists, keeping mount tools' elif [ "$laxsudo" '!=' 1 ] ; then echo 'Hash for surfer missing, deleting mount tools' rm /home/surfer/Desktop/030_mmmm.desktop rm /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/launcher-12473151760.rc mv /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/launcher-9.rc /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/launcher-9.bak cat /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/launcher-9.bak | head -n 13 > /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/launcher-9.rc sed -i 's/<item name="launcher" id="12473151760"\/>/<!-- weg damit -->/g' /home/surfer/.config/xfce4/panel/panels.xml fi fi
# Lets take a look at Kasperskys expiration date today=` date +%Y%m%d ` expir=20111231
if [ "$today" -gt "$expir" -o "$lang" = "pl" ] && grep 'Name=Kaspersky' /home/surfer/Desktop/030_kaspersky.desktop ; then sed -i 's/Name=Kaspersky/Name=ClamAV/g' /home/surfer/Desktop/030_kaspersky.desktop sed -i 's/Exec=run-kaspersky-gui.sh/Exec=avfrontend-clamav.sh/g' /home/surfer/Desktop/030_kaspersky.desktop fi if [ '!' -x '/opt/kaspersky/kav4ws/bin/kav4ws-kavscanner' ] && grep 'Name=Kaspersky' /home/surfer/Desktop/030_kaspersky.desktop ; then sed -i 's/Name=Kaspersky/Name=ClamAV/g' /home/surfer/Desktop/030_kaspersky.desktop sed -i 's/Exec=run-kaspersky-gui.sh/Exec=avfrontend-clamav.sh/g' /home/surfer/Desktop/030_kaspersky.desktop fi
# Delete the PDFs on Polish builds if [ "$lang" = "pl" ] ; then rm -rf "/home/surfer/Desktop/Anleitungen" fi # Delete the PDFs on Spanish builds if [ "$lang" = "es" ] ; then rm -rf "/home/surfer/Desktop/Anleitungen" [ -d /lesslinux/cdrom/Manual ] && ln -sf /lesslinux/cdrom/Manual /home/surfer/Desktop/Manual [ -d /lesslinux/toram/Manual ] && ln -sf /lesslinux/toram/Manual /home/surfer/Desktop/Manual fi # Delete the PDFs on German builds if [ "$lang" = "de" ] ; then if [ -d /lesslinux/cdrom/Anleitungen ] ; then rm -rf /home/surfer/Desktop/Anleitungen ln -sf /lesslinux/cdrom/Anleitungen /home/surfer/Desktop/Anleitungen elif [ -d /lesslinux/toram/Anleitungen ] ; then rm -rf /home/surfer/Desktop/Anleitungen ln -sf /lesslinux/toram/Anleitungen /home/surfer/Desktop/Anleitungen fi fi
# Replace changed wicd icon path sed -i 's/=wicd-client/=wicd-gtk/g' /home/surfer/Desktop/005_wicd.desktop sed -i 's+/usr/sbin/testdisk+testdisk+g' /home/surfer/Desktop/730_testdisk.desktop
# Temporary fixes!
[ -f /home/surfer/.config/Trolltech.conf ] || cp /etc/lesslinux/branding/misc/Trolltech.conf /home/surfer/.config/
setxkbmap -layout "$xkbmap" if [ -n "$xrandr" ] ; then /usr/bin/xrandr --size "$xrandr" fi /usr/bin/xfce4-session
